text.content: I want to take his eyes out  Just for looking at you  Yes I do  I want to take his hands off  Just for touching you  Yes I do    And I want to rip his heart out  Just for hurting you  And I want to break his mind down  Yes I do    And I want to make him  Regret life since the day he met you  Yes I do  And I want to make him  Take back all that he took from you  Yes I do    And I want to rip his heart out  Just for hurting you  And I want to break his mind down  Yes I do  Yes I do  Yes I do  Yes I do    And I want to rip his heart out  Just for hurting you  And I want to break his mind down  Yes I do  Yes I do  Yes I do  Yes I do
